comments.creator: rahulag@yahoo-inc.com
comments.author: rahulag@yahoo-inc.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 558263
Screen shot 2011-09-05 at 4.52.29 PM.JPG

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/534.30 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/12.0.742.122 Safari/534.30

Steps to reproduce:

I upgraded firefox from 6.0 to 6.0.1 and restart the browser.


Actual results:

After restart, yahoo toolbar (add-on) did not start . Then I restarted browser again , it worked then.


Expected results:

yahoo toolbar should start after first restart of browser only.

First time, registration of add-on failed . It might be because of firefox is trying to register a add-on even before it (firefox) is completely ready.

PFA screen shot of error-console.

Steps to reproduce:

Actual results:

After restart, yahoo toolbar (add-on) did not start . Then I restarted browser again , it worked then.


Expected results:

First time, registration of add-on failed . It might be because of firefox is trying to register a add-on even before it (firefox) is completely ready.
